Glossary and Tag List

Below is a list of tags that can be used with the WDK and an explanation of what they do.

Basics

<!--WDK:templateinfo:notes:value--> value <String> Sets the notes/description of the current template to the specified value. <!--WDK:comment:value--> value <String> Include your own comments in the original WDK code. These comments will not appear in the code on the published site.
